Scene.T: [face=Glitch]Hello! You can go to the next message with [controller=A][keyboard=W].
I can also skip it automatically.[wait=1.5][skip]
[]And you can't skip this text! Go on! Try it![wait=2] See?[wait=0.5] Told ya.
[playermove=false][noskip]You can make the player stop moving...[wait=2]
[playermove=true][noskip]...Or allow you to, so the message goes while playing.
I can talk [wait=1][speed=0]really fast [wait=1][speed=0.5]or really slow.
I can also add...[wait=2]uh...[wait=2]Oh![wait=0.5] Right![wait=0.5] Pauses!
I can also [end]end the message abruptly anytime.
[end]Or just show it all from the start.
[face=Bug]There's also a tag for changing the showing face, including pitch!
[face=Glitch]And you don't have to make any sprite references! It is automatically readed with a resource.loadAll().
[face=Bug]But don't worry! If it's called once, it is stored for fast future use, so you there's no performance drop!
[face=None]If you put "none" on the face tag, this is what happens. Ideal for narration!
[face=Glitch][bga=0.35]You can also change the background transparency!
[bga=1][align=right]You can also change...
[align=center]...the text align...
[align=left]...with tags!
So yeah, have fun.
[playermove=false][face=Bug]Welcome to the Glitch World!
[face=Glitch][speed=0.05]Uh...[wait=0.5][speed=0.02]I know where we are, Bug.[wait=0.2] This is where I was born.[wait=0.2] We were trying to get into the actual game, remember?
[face=Bug][speed=0.05]Oh...[wait=0.35]yeah,[wait=0.15] yeah,[wait=0.15][speed=0.02] this is just tutorial etiquette.
Just remember you can move [controller=tilting the left stick][keyboard=pressing A and D].[wait=0.4] Let's proceed to the right!
[playermove=false][face=Bug][bga=0.5]Those little things in front of us are glitch fragments.[wait=0.2] They're everywhere.[wait=0.2] Pick them, they will increase your score!
[tutorialArrow=0]You can see how many of them you have in here.
[face=Glitch][tutorialArrow=-1]And what about that strange hexagon?
[face=Bug]Those are special glitch fragments.
They're a bit trickier to get, but they're worthy.[wait=0.2] Your final score will increase greatly!
[playermove=false][face=Bug][bga=1]You can jump pressing [controller=A][keyboard=W].[wait=0.3] The longer you press,[wait=0.2] the higher the jump!
[playermove=false][face=Bug][tutorialArrow=3]You may have noticed that we're moving on this slide.[wait=0.2] This indicates our position on the level.
[tutorialArrow=-1][tutorialArrow=2]This are the heroes.[wait=0.2] They're trying to rescue the princess too.
If they complete the level before us,[wait=0.1] we will get a Game Over!
[tutorialArrow=-1]We're in the Glitch World and here time goes slower,[wait=0.1] so don't worry.[wait=0.2] We have plenty of it.
[playermove=false][face=Bug]Oh![wait=0.4] A door![wait=0.4] We probably need a key![wait=0.4] We should go back and...[wait=0.2]
[face=Glitch]Or we could press the [controller=X button][keyboard=space bar] to use our teleport.
I will teleport [controller=in the direction the left stick was pointing at when the button was pressed][keyboard=in the direction of the movement keys you were pressing when it activated].
It ignores any collisions, so I can use it to go through walls, enemies and other solid objects.
[face=Bug][speed=0.07]...Yeah, we could do that too.
[speed=0][seed=0]Party pooper.[wait=0.5][skip]
[playermove=false][face=Bug]You can use the teleport while jumping, too.[wait=0.2] So it's kind of a double jump!
[playermove=false][face=Bug][speed=0.07]Uh...[wait=1][speed=0.03]Glitch?[wait=1][speed=0.02] What are you doing?
[face=Glitch]I just felt a sudden urge for getting in here to see what would happen.
[face=Bug]I...[wait=1]uh...[wait=1]Okay...
[face=Glitch]Don't judge me.
[face=Bug]Oh...[wait=1][speed=0.04]no...[wait=1][speed=0.07]no...
[face=Glitch]I can feel you judging me!
[face=Bug]W-[wait=1]We should move on!
[playermove=false][face=Bug]Remember that teleportation can go on any direction,[wait=0.2] including diagonal and downward if you're jumping.
[face=Bug][playermove=false]Do you see the exclamation over you head?[wait=0.2] And the distortion in front of you?
If there's an exclamation over you head,[wait=0.2] it means that you can bug something on the level pressing [controller=Y][keyboard=shift].
Using this power near this kind of distortions will create platforms!
[face=Bug][playermove=false][bga=0.5]This is a checkpoint.
[tutorialArrow=4]If you lose a life you will return here.[wait=0.2] It will also heal you completely upon fist activation.
[tutorialArrow=-1][tutorialArrow=0]If you lose all three lives you will have to spend glitch fragments if you want to return to the last checkpoint.
[tutorialArrow=-1]But don't worry,[wait=0.15] you won't lose lives in the Glitch World,[wait=0.15] so keep practicing here until you're confident.
[face=Bug][playermove=false][bga=1]If you see this cute green particles,[wait=0.15] that means this wall is climbable.
Just jump to it and,[wait=0.15] when you're stuck,[wait=0.15] keep pressing the jump button,[wait=0.15] no direction needed.
[face=Bug][playermove=false]Those are bouncy artichokes![wait=0.6] If you press jump at the right time,[wait=0.2] you can get really high!
[face=Bug][playermove=false]If you press [controller=B][keyboard=CTRL] you will make the game's FPS drop,[wait=0.2] slowing it down.[wait=0.4] It will make traps easier to avoid!
You can deactivate it whenever you want by pressing [controller=B][keyboard=CTRL] again.
[tutorialArrow=1]But be careful,[wait=0.2] it doesn't last forever![wait=0.4] This bar shows how many time left you have.
The bar will start filling itself once the power is deactivated,[wait=0.2] so don't worry about that.
[tutorialArrow=-1]Let's try it in this crushy-thingies!
[face=Bug][playermove=false]Well, I expected more opposition on our way to the "true game" portal.
[face=Bug][playermove=false]And I should probably just shut up.[wait=0.4] Yup,[wait=0.2] that would probably help.
[noskip][face=Bug][playermove=false][speed=0.07]Well...[wait=1.5]this is it.
Here's the portal.[wait=1] If we go to the other side, we will be breaking the rules.
Everyone will be against us,[wait=0.5] and we don't know how our actions will affect that world.
[speed=0.05]With that being said...[wait=2][speed=0.07] Are you sure you want to continue?
[face=Glitch][speed=0.17]......
[speed=0.17]I...[wait=2][speed=0.07]I don't want to be looked down on.
[speed=0.07]I don't want to feel like this game is not my home too.
[speed=0.07]I don't want to be just[speed=0.1]...[wait=1.5][speed=0.09]an error.
I must do this.[wait=1.5] I must rescue that princess and become a heroe.
[face=Bug][speed=0.17]....[wait=1.5][speed=0.05]So be it.
Step into the portal.[wait=1] Let's show them who's boss.
[noskip][face=Bug][playermove=false][speed=0.07]...This is going to be a looooong tutorial...

EndMessage.Title: Tutorial Complete
EndMessage.Subtitle: It's time for a new adventure!

Scene.T: [playermove=false][face=Bug]¡Bienvenido al Mundo Glitch!
[face=Glitch][speed=0.05]Eh...[wait=0.5][speed=0.02]Ya sé donde estamos, Bug.[wait=0.2] He nacido aquí.[wait=0.2] Estábamos intentando meternos en el verdadero juego ¿Recuerdas?
[face=Bug][speed=0.05]¡Ah...![wait=0.35] Sí,[wait=0.15] sí,[wait=0.15][speed=0.02] era sólo una formalidad de tutorial.
Al grano.[wait=0.2] Recuerda que puedes moverte [controller=inclinando el stick izquierdo][keyboard=pulsando A y D].[wait=0.4] ¡Prosigamos por la derecha!
[playermove=false][face=Bug][bga=0.5]Esas pequeñas cosas delante de nosotros son fragmentos de glitch.[wait=0.2] Están por todas partes.
¡Recógelos, incrementarán tu puntuación!
[tutorialArrow=0]Puedes ver cuántos tienes aquí.
[face=Glitch][tutorialArrow=-1]¿Y qué hay de ese extraño hexágono?
[face=Bug]Esos son fragmentos especiales de glitch.
Son mas díficiles de alcanzar, pero merecen la pena.[wait=0.2] ¡Tu puntuación final se disparará!
[playermove=false][face=Bug][bga=1]Puedes saltar pulsando [controller=A][keyboard=W]. ¡Cuanto más tiempo lo mantengas pulsado, más alto llegarás!
[playermove=false][face=Bug][tutorialArrow=3]Puede que te hayas fijado en que nos estamos moviendo en esta barra.[wait=0.2] Ésta es nuestra posición en el nivel.
[tutorialArrow=-1][tutorialArrow=2]Estos son los héroes.[wait=0.2] También están intentando salvara a la princesa.
Si acaban el nivel antes que nosotros...[wait=0.2]¡Será Game Over!
[tutorialArrow=-1]Pero no te preocupes por ahora,[wait=0.1] en el Mundo Glitch el tiempo va mas despacio.[wait=0.2] Tenemos de sobra.
[playermove=false][face=Bug]¡Oh![wait=0.4] ¡Una puerta![wait=0.4] ¡Quizá haga falta una llave![wait=0.4] Deberíamos volver y...[wait=0.2]
[face=Glitch]O podríamos pulsar [controller=el botón X][keyboard=la barra espaciadora] para usar nuestro teletransporte.
Me teletransportaré [controller=en la dirección a la que apuntaba el joystick izquierdo][keyboard=en la dirección de las teclas de movimiento] cuando fue activado.
Ignora toda colisión, asi que puedo usarlo para atravesar paredes, enemigos y otros objetos sólidos.
[face=Bug][speed=0.07]...Sí, también podríamos hacer eso.
[speed=0][seed=0]Aguafiestas.[wait=0.5][skip]
[playermove=false][face=Bug]También puedes teletransportarte mientras saltas.[wait=0.2] ¡Es como un doble salto!
[playermove=false][face=Bug][speed=0.07]Uh...[wait=1][speed=0.03]¿Glitch?[wait=1][speed=0.02] ¿Qué haces?
[face=Glitch]De pronto me ha dado por meterme aquí a ver que pasaba.
[face=Bug]Yo...[wait=1]uhm...[wait=1]Vale...
[face=Glitch]No me juzges.
[face=Bug]Oh...[wait=1][speed=0.04]no...[wait=1][speed=0.07]no...
[face=Glitch]¡Noto como me juzgas!
[face=Bug]¡D-[wait=1]deberíamos ir tirando!
[playermove=false][face=Bug]Recuerda que puedes teletransportarte en cualquier dirección,[wait=0.2] incluyendo en diagonal o hacia abajo si saltas.
[face=Bug][playermove=false]¿Ves la exclamación sobre tu cabeza?[wait=0.2] ¿Y la distorsión frente a ti?
Si hay una exclamación sobre tu cabeza significa que puedes bugear algo en el nivel pulsando [controller=Y][keyboard=shift].
Si usas este poder en este tipo de distorsiones...[wait=0.2]¡Crearás plataformas!
[face=Bug][playermove=false][bga=0.5]Esto es un punto de control.
[tutorialArrow=4]Si pierdes una vida volverás aquí.[wait=0.2] También te curará por cumpleto la primera vez que pases por él.
[tutorialArrow=-1][tutorialArrow=0]Si pierdes las tres vidas tendrás que gastar fragmentos de glitch para volver al último punto de control.
[tutorialArrow=-1]No te preocupes por ahora,[wait=0.15] no puedes perder vidas en el Mundo Glitch,[wait=0.15] asi que practica hasta que estés contento.
[face=Bug][playermove=false][bga=1]Si ves esas partículas verdes tan monas, significa que esta pared es trepable.
Salta sobre ella y,[wait=0.15] cuando estés pegado,[wait=0.15] sigue pulsando el botón de saltar,[wait=0.15] sin ir a ninguna dirección.
[face=Bug][playermove=false]¡Alcachofas rebotantes![wait=0.6] ¡Si pulsas el botón de salto en el momento preciso puedes llegar muy alto!
[face=Bug][playermove=false]Si pulsas [controller=B][keyboard=CTRL] harás que los FPS del juego bajen, ralentizándolo.[wait=0.4] ¡Esquivar trampas estará chupado!
Puedes desactivarlo cuando quieras pulsando [controller=B][keyboard=CTRL] de nuevo.
[tutorialArrow=1]¡Pero cuidado,[wait=0.2] que no dura para siempre![wait=0.4] Esta barra te indica cuánto tiempo te queda.
No te preocupes,[wait=0.2] la barra se irá rellenando sola cuando mientras el poder esté inactivo.
[tutorialArrow=-1]¡Vamos a probarlo con esos cachivaches aplastadores!
[face=Bug][playermove=false]Eh, pues este camino tiene poca resistencia para ser el que lleva al portal del "Auténtico juego".
[face=Bug][playermove=false]Y debería cerrar el pico de una vez.[wait=0.4] Sep,[wait=0.2] va a ser lo mejor.
[noskip][face=Bug][playermove=false][speed=0.07]Y al fin...[wait=1.5]hemos llegado.
Este es el portal.[wait=1] Si pasamos al otro lado, estaremos rompiendo las reglas.
Todo el mundo estará contra nosotros,[wait=0.5] y no sabemos como nuestras acciones podrían afectar a ese mundo.
[speed=0.05]Dicho esto...[wait=2][speed=0.07] ¿Estás seguro de que quieres continuar?
[face=Glitch][speed=0.17]......
[speed=0.17]Yo...[wait=2][speed=0.07]Quiero que me dejen de mirar por encima del hombro.
[speed=0.07]Quiero dejar de sentir que no tengo derecho a llamar a este juego mi hogar.
[speed=0.07]Quiero dejar de ser un simple[speed=0.1]...[wait=1.5][speed=0.09]error.
Tengo que hacer esto.[wait=1.5] Rescataré a la princesa y me convertiré en un héroe.
[face=Bug][speed=0.17]....[wait=1.5][speed=0.05]Así sea.
Adéntrate en el portal.[wait=1] Enseñémosles quién manda.
[noskip][face=Bug][playermove=false][speed=0.07]...Qué laaaargo se va a hacer este tutorial...
